channel.title: Compiler/Run help?
channel.description:
First, we will start with Run.bat... Every time I open it it says "'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file.
Second, compiler. I think I compiled correctly but it says as a note "Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Next note; Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Then the "Press any key to continue".
CAN ANYONE HELP ME??

item.title: Compiler/Run help?
item.dc:creator: @Merlen321 Merlen321
item.description:
@Merlen321 wrote:

Umm. Im still confused… Im cleard up on the compiler issue now, but for run this is what i have;

@echo off
cls
title Skullerscape
java -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

What should I put instead? If it helps, I have JDK 6 with update 24.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler/Run help?
item.dc:creator: @Merlen321 Merlen321
item.description:
@Merlen321 wrote:

First, we will start with Run.bat… Every time I open it it says "‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file.

Second, compiler. I think I compiled correctly but it says as a note "Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Next note; Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Then the “Press any key to continue”.

CAN ANYONE HELP ME??

Read full topic
